Introduction
This topic contains information on the responsibilities of the Regional Loan Centers (RLCs) for handling VA pension-related home loans, including
each RLC’s jurisdiction and addresses
sending the Veteran’s income and net worth information to the PMC for review
, and
examples of information the RLC may send the PMC for review
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 7, Section B - Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Pension-Related Home Loans
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 7, Section B
